name: Eagle Web
tagline: Desenvolvimento de sites e lojas virtuais
description:
The Eagle Web is an agency specializing in Internet solutions that span virtual stores (e-commerce), website development, corporate portals, B2B solutions, email marketing, marketing consulting for web and software development.
Headquartered in Criciúma W2 operates in the market serving customers of all sizes in various states of Brazil always focusing on our main goal: bring back to the customer's investment.
